entry.title: WIND WARNING , Quaqtaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:55 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Quaqtaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:52 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.8°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Sunday: Blizzard. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind east 70 km/h gusting to 100. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind east 60 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
